Government of Canada
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Tender Notice
### Tender Notice: Consultations on Blood Safety in Canada

#### Details
Tender Identification Number: 1000248797_B
Contracting Authority: Health Canada
Location: Canada

#### Notice Information
Type: Request for Proposal
Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
Reason for Limited Tendering: Not applicable

#### Service Requirement
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) requires a contractor to conduct consultations to provide recommendations on its roles, responsibilities, and priorities in the surveillance of the transfusion of blood/blood products and the transplantation of cells, tissues, and organs (CTO) in the current blood safety landscape in Canada.

#### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: Not applicable, as the tender has expired.
* Expected Contract Start and End Dates: Not specified.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be selected based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Jeremy Mallon
jeremy.mallon@hc-sc.gc.ca
(613) 371-3237
200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9, Canada

#### Attachments
The following documents are available on the Canada Buying Service website: 
* Request for Proposal Document
* Questions and Answers Document
